remarks: A lemma for introducing a universal quantifier, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
statement:
alrimii.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
alrimii.2 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
alrimii.3 $e |- ( [. y / x ]. ch <-> ps ) $.
alrimii.4 $e |- F/ y ch $.
alrimii $p |- ( ph -> A. x ch ) $.
$d x y $.
